FuncDef: This command configures the value of the MLFR bundle ingress per-class reassembly timer for the profile.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the timeout value, in ms. Values-1 to 1000.

ExtraInfo: Default: reassembly-timeout 25 - class 0reassembly-timeout 25 - class 1reassembly-timeout 100 - class 2reassembly-timeout 1000 - class 3
